name: pixiv
description: A very rudimentary Pixiv image embedder.

options.name: url
options.description: The Pixiv URL to get images from.

options.name: start
options.description: The first image in the Pixiv album to include. Defaults to 1.

options.name: count
options.description: How many images to include. Default behavior will include up to 6 images after StartImage.
